affiliation.en: National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology

section.ja: 地質情報研究部門 地球変動史研究グループ

award_name.ja: 日本古生物学会学術賞
日本古生物学会論文賞

paper_title.ja: 山形県小国町明沢川地域から産出したVicarya化石

paper_title.en: Refined Early to Middle Miocene diatom biochronology for the middle- to high-latitude North Pacific

description.en: Refined numerical ages of the diatom biohorizons of the Early to Middle Miocene (11-18 Ma) period in the Neogene North Pacific are presented based on the direct correlation between biostratigraphy and magnetostratigraphy at Site 887 on the Patton-Murray Seamount in the northeastern Pacific. Sampling intervals of 0.02-0.04 my allowed the determination of the ages of the biohorizons to be more precise than previous studies. The secondary biohorizons established in the northwestern Pacific have been proven to be useful also in the northeastern Pacific, and are linked to magnetostratigraphy directly for the first time. The refined diatom biochronology established in this study will provide a vital basis for the study of the Neogene marine sediments of the middle- to high-latitude North Pacific, which rarely yield calcareous microfossils. Denticulopsis praedimorpha var. prima n. var. is described.

paper_title.ja: 新潟県中越地震と地質構造との関係
新潟県北蒲原郡胎内川における鮮新統鍬江層の浮遊性有孔虫化石層序―No. 3 Globorolalia inflata bed下限の年代について―
paper_title.en: Planktonic foraminiferal biostratigraphy of the Pliocene Kuwae Formation in the Tainai River section, Niigata Prefecture and the age of the base of the No. 3 Globorotalia inflata bed

publication_name.en: Journal of the Japanese Association for Petroleum Technology

paper_title.ja: 富山県氷見市灘浦地域の薮田層（鮮新統）の浮遊性有孔虫化石群集-とくにNo.3 Globorotalia inflata bed の下限の年代について-
paper_title.en: Planktonic foraminiferal assemblages from the Pliocene Yabuta Formation, Nadaura, Himi City, Toyama Prefecture, with special reference to the base of the No.3 Globorotalia inflata bed

description.ja: Planktonic foraminiferal biostratigraphy is established for the late Pliocene Yabuta Formation exposed in the Yabuta, Kosugi and Oosakai sections in the Himi-Nadaura area, Toyama Prefecture, central Japan. The Orbulina universa/Globorotalia ikebei Zone (PF6) and the Neogloboquadrina pachyderms (dextral)/Globorotalia orientalis Zone (PF7) of Maiya (1978) and Miwa et al. (2004) are recognized in the Yabuta Formation. In addition, No. 3 Globorotalia inflata bed which is characterized by the abundant occurrence of G. inflata group (G. orientalis and G. inflata praeinflata) is identified in the Yabuta Formation. The base of the No. 3 G. inflata bed lies between the first occurrence of Neodenticula koizumii (diatom, 3.5Ma) and the rapid increase of N. koizumii (3.0-3.1Ma), and dated at about 3.25Ma by interpolation.
description.en: Planktonic foraminiferal biostratigraphy is established for the late Pliocene Yabuta Formation exposed in the Yabuta, Kosugi and Oosakai sections in the Himi-Nadaura area, Toyama Prefecture, central Japan. The Orbulina universa/Globorotalia ikebei Zone (PF6) and the Neogloboquadrina pachyderms (dextral)/Globorotalia orientalis Zone (PF7) of Maiya (1978) and Miwa et al. (2004) are recognized in the Yabuta Formation. In addition, No. 3 Globorotalia inflata bed which is characterized by the abundant occurrence of G. inflata group (G. orientalis and G. inflata praeinflata) is identified in the Yabuta Formation. The base of the No. 3 G. inflata bed lies between the first occurrence of Neodenticula koizumii (diatom, 3.5Ma) and the rapid increase of N. koizumii (3.0-3.1Ma), and dated at about 3.25Ma by interpolation.

publisher.ja: The Japanese Association for Petroleum Technology
publisher.en: The Japanese Association for Petroleum Technology

paper_title.ja: 福島県太平洋岸の鮮新統大年寺層に挟在する広域テフラ層
paper_title.en: Widespread tephra beds in the Pliocene Dainenji Formation in the Pacific coast, Fukushima Prefecture, northeastern Japan

description.ja: 福島県の太平洋岸に分布する鮮新統大年寺層から2層の広域分布テフラ層を見出した.本層は,おもに泥質砂岩から構成されており,多くのテフラ層を挟む.これらのうちのSF4.5とSF8.3テフラ層は,黒雲母を含むことと火山ガラスのカリウム量が高濃度(高カリウム領域)であることから,大年寺層中のその他のテフラとは区別される.SF4.5テフラ層は,おもにシルトサイズのガラス質火山灰からなり,バブルジャンクション型の火山ガラス片を含むことが特徴である.こうした特徴と,微化石層序との関係,テフラ層の層序関係・岩相・記載岩石学的特徴および火山ガラスの化学組成から,SF4.5テフラ層は本州中央部を広く覆う鮮新世広域テフラ層の1つであるZnp-Ohtaテフラ層に対比される.また,SF8.3テフラ層は新潟堆積盆で広く分布するYmpテフラ層に対比される可能性がある.
description.en: Two widespread tephra beds are detected in the Pliocene Dainenji Formation distributed in the Pacific coast area in Fukushima Prefecture. The formation is composed mainly of muddy sandstone and intercalated with a number of tephra beds. The tephra beds are distinguished from the other tephra beds in the formation by containing of biotite crystals and high concentration of potassium in volcanic glass (High-K field). The SF4.5 Tephra Bed consists mainly of silt grained vitric ash characterized by bubble junction shards. Such characteristic glass shards along with microfossil biostratigraphy, stratigraphic relationship, lithofacies, petrographic characteristics and chemical composition of volcanic glass indicate that the SF4.5 Tephra Bed is correlated to the Znp-Ohta Tephra Bed, a lower Pliocene widespread tephara bed distributed in the central Honshu. The SF8.3 Tephra Bed is possibly correlated to the Ymp Tephra Bed distributed widely in Niigata sedimentary basin.

publisher.en: The Association for the Geological Collaboration in Japan

paper_title.ja: 埼玉県比企丘陵に分布する中新統の層序-複合年代層序に基づく岩相層序の総括-
paper_title.en: Stratigraphy of the Miocene Series in the Hiki Hills, Saitama Prefecture, central Japan : Synthesis of the lithostratigraphy based on integrated geochronology

description.ja: 埼玉県比企丘陵と岩殿丘陵の間にわずかに露出する海波中背統より,Denticulopsis lauta帯を示す珪藻化石が産出した.新たに得られた珪藻化石年代と既存の報告を総括し,比企丘陵の岩相順序を年代層序に基づいて整理した.その結果. 15.4 Maを境にして下位の珪藻質シルト岩からなる荒川層と,上位の砂質シルト岩からなり不淘汰角榛岩や砂質シルト岩さらに砂質シルト岩の同時榛を取り込む海底地滑り堆積物からなる市ノ川層に二分されることが判明した.新たに得られたT-3凝灰岩(畠山凝灰岩)のフィッショントラック年代は上記年代層序と矛盾しない.さらに,関東山地周辺地域に分布する海成中新統と岩相・年代層序を比較した結果,新たに総括された比企丘陵の中新統湖岸は周辺地域の岩相層序の特徴とよく対応することが明らかとなった.
description.en: Marine diatoms occur in the Miocene marine sequence of the Arakawa and Ichinokawa Formations distributed along the Tokigawa River in the southern part of the Hiki Hills, central Japan. Twenty-two samples yield age diagnostic diatom fossils, which indicates the sequence belongs to the lower Denticulopsis lauta Zone (NPD 4A). Combining with lithologic characters with diatom geochronology, the lithostratigraphic boundary between the underlying siltstone of the Arakawa Formation and overlying sandy siltstone with poorly sorted breccia of the Ichinokawa Formation is dated as 15.4 Ma. Fission track age of thick felsic tuff within the Arakawa Formation is also determined. Litho- and chrono-stratigraphies of the Hiki and Iwadono Hills are well correlated with those of the Miocene marine sequences in and around the Kanto Mountains.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Geological Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: K-Ar ages of the Shogunzawa and Okuda Tuff beds in the Miocene marine sequence in the Iwadono Hills, central Japan.
paper_title.en: K-Ar ages of the Shogunzawa and Okuda Tuff beds in the Miocene marine sequence in the Iwadono Hills, central Japan

description.ja: 埼玉県岩殿丘陵に分布する中新世海成層に挟在する2層の珪長質火砕流堆積物についてK-Ar年代を測定し,将軍沢凝灰岩(黒雲母)については11.99±0.27Ma(誤差±1σ)および12.01±0.27Maの,一方,奥田凝灰岩(角閃石)については10.90±0.30Maおよび10.85±0.2Maの年代値を得た。既報の各種浮遊性微化石生層準の見積もり年代とともに,岩殿丘陵の中新統の年代層序を総括した。さらに,堆積速度曲線を作成した結果,中期中新世初期の海進直後は非常に遅い堆積速度が示されるが,およそ12.5Maに珪藻質シルト岩が堆積をはじめると,堆積速度は飛躍的に増大したことが明らかとなった。
description.en: K-Ar ages were determined for the Shogunzawa and Okuda Tuff beds in the Miocene marine sequence in the Iwadono Hills, Saitama Prefecture, central Japan. The K-Ar ages on Shogunzawa biotite(11.99±0.27 Ma and 12.01±0.27 Ma; 1σerror) are well consistent with a <sup>40</sup>Ar-<sup>39</sup>Ar age of the correlative tuff(Kitamura Tuff bed: 11.79±0.08 Ma; 2σerror) in the Tomioka area.The K-Ar ages were obtained from the Okuda hornblende as 10.90±0.30 Ma and 10.85±0.28 Ma. Combining with microfossil biostratigraphy, the sediment accumulation rate of the Miocene marine sequence in the Iwadono Hills is suggested to have increased at around 12.5 Ma.

publisher.ja: The Japanese Association for Petroleum Technology
publisher.en: The Japanese Association for Petroleum Technology

paper_title.ja: 新潟県中条地域中新統内須川層のテフラ層序
paper_title.en: Tephrostratigraphy of the Miocene Uchisugawa Formation in the Nakajo area, Niigata Prefecture, northeast Japan

description.ja: 新潟県北蒲原郡中条町地域のつつじが丘セクションに露出する中部〜上部中新統の内須川層のテフラ層序を研究した.内須川層は塊状の珪藻質泥岩からなり,鮮新統の鍬江層に不整合に覆われる.本セクションに挟在する19層のテフラ層について,岩相・層厚・堆積構造・記載岩石学的特徴(構成粒子組成・重鉱物組成・火山ガラスの形状)および火山ガラスの化学組成を記載した.珪藻化石帯はNPD 5D帯からNPD 6B帯が認められ,珪藻化石層序とテフラ層序の直接の対応関係が明らかになった.珪藻化石層序データに基づくグラフ対比法および構成粒子の特徴の類似性から,つつじが丘セクションのTtj09テフラ層は広域分布指標テフラ層であり,新潟県新発田地域の内須川層のSkhqテフラ層,および津川町地域の野村層のTmhqテフラ層と対比されることが明らかとなった.
description.en: Tephrostratigraphy is established for the middle to upper Miocene Uchisugawa Formation exposed in the Tsutsujigaoka section in Nakajo Town, Niigata Prefecture, central Japan. The formation in this section is composed of massive diatomaceous mudstone, and unconformably covered by the Pliocene Kuwae Formation. Nineteen tephra beds intercalated in the Uchisugawa Formation were described with their lithology, thickness, sedimentary structures, petrographical characteristics (component assemblage, heavy mineral assemblage and shape of volcanic glass) and chemical composition of glass shards. Diatom zones from the zone NPD 5D through the zone NPD 6B with six useful diatom biohorizons are recognized, and direct correlation between diatom biostratigraphy and tephrostratigraphy is established. Graphic correlation and petrographical similarity indicate that the Ttj 09 Tephra Bed in the Tsutsujigaoka section is a wide-spread tephra correlative with the Skhq Tephra Bed in the Uchisugawa Formation (Shibata area) and Tmhq Tephra Bed in the Nomura Formation (Tsugawa area).

publisher.en: The Association for the Geological Collaboration in Japan

paper_title.ja: 常磐地域日立市に分布する中新統多賀層群の複合年代層序
paper_title.en: Integrated chronostratigraphy of the Miocene Taga Group, Joban area, northeastern Japan

description.ja: 常磐地域南部に属する茨城県日立市の田尻,滑川および鮎川セクションに露出する中新統多賀層群について,複合年代層序学的検討を行った.田尻および滑川セクションは珪藻化石層序のNPD 5帯最上部〜NPD 5D帯下部に,一方,石灰質ナンノ化石層序ではCN 7帯に相当することが判明した.また,鮎川セクションのテフラ層(Kob 27とKob 66)について,それぞれ12.1±0.2Ma (黒雲母)と10.1±0.2Ma (普通角閃石)のK-Ar年代値を得た.この結果,後期中新世の限定された区間ではあるが,珪藻化石と石灰質ナンノ化石層序の直接の関係がより明確になり,さらに放射年代に基づいて珪藻生層準に確かな年代を与えることができた.そして,これらの結果を踏まえて,古地磁気微化石年代尺度の確度と精度の問題点について検討した.他方,珪藻のDenticulopsis crassaは,その終産出層準の直下で蓋殻面の点紋が退化する進化的形態変化を起こしていることが判明した.この形態変化を正確に捉えることで,この種の終産出層準を確定し,層序学的に有効な生層準として適用できる可能性があることがわかった.
description.en: Diatom and calcareous nannofossil biostratigraphies were established for the middle to upper Miocene Taga Group exposed in the Tajiri and Namekawa stratigraphic sections of Hitachi City (southern Joban area), Ibaraki Prefecture, northeastern Japan. The diatomaceous mudstone in these sections are correlative with the uppermost NPD 5C to the lowest NPD 5D zones of Yanagisawa and Akiba's (1998) diatom zonation and the zone CN 7 of Okada and Bukry's (1980) calcareous nannofossil zonation. K-Ar dating was conducted for four tephra beds in the Ayukawa stratigraphic section. The tephra beds Kob 27 and Kob 66 were dated at 12.1±0.2Ma (biotite) and 10.1±0.2Ma (hornblende), respectively. On the basis of integrated biochronology and K-Ar ages of this study, the accuracy of geomagnetic polarity time scales is discussed. This study revealed that diatom species Denticulopsis crassa underwent a successive reduction of puncta on the valve face just before its extinction. This distinct evolutionary change makes it easy to identify the last occurrence of this species, which is of potential stratigraphic value.

publisher.en: The Association for the Geological Collaboration in Japan

paper_title.ja: 千葉県南部鴨川中深層観測井の坑井地質と地質年代

publication_name.ja: 防災科学技術研究所報告

paper_title.en: Planktonic forantiniferal biostratigraphy of the Miocene sequence in the Iwadono Hills, central Japan: An integrated approach

description.en: Planktonic foraminiferal age of the Miocene sequence in the Iwadono Hills of central Japan is determined in reference to recent advances in Miocene planktonic foraminiferal biostratigraphy of Japan. The interval from the Godo through the Negishi to the lower part of the Shogunzawa Members of the Iwadono Formation yields 55 species of planktonic foraminiferal fossils. The Godo Member is assigned to planktonic foraminiferal zone N.8. The Negishi Member and the lower part of the Shogunzawa Member are confined to zones N.10 to N.13. Nine foraminiferal biohorizons were detected, seven of which enable us to determine a detailed age-thickness model for the sequence. The age-thickness model indicates a remarkably slow sedimentation rate in the Negishi Member (less than 9 mm / kyr). Furthermore, a relationship is established between the foraminiferal biostratigraphy and other stratigraphic data (diatoms, calcareous nannofossils, and radiometric ages) in the area. This relationship agrees well with the age-correlation chart of Japanese Neogene sediments.

paper_title.ja: 新潟県新発田市北東部地域の中新統の珪藻化石層序とテフラ層序の対比
paper_title.en: Integration of diatom biostratigraphy and tephrostratigraphy of the Miocene sequence in the northeastern part of Shibata area, Niigata Prefecture, central Japan

description.ja: 新潟県新発田市北東部に分布する中新統内須川層の珪藻化石層序を検討し,珪藻化石層序とテフラ層序の詳細な関係を明らかにした.本層は塊状の珪藻質泥岩からなり,多数のテフラ層を挟む.そのうち4層は広域に分布し,広域対比に有用である.珪藻化石帯はNPD 5B帯からNPD 7A帯までが認められた.また,9つの珪藻生層準も確認され,内須川層について高分解能の珪藻化石層序およびテフラ層序の枠組みが確立された.その結果に基づいて作成された堆積速度曲線からの内挿によって,内須川層中の4層の指標テフラ層,Kdg,Gtm,SkhqおよびJngテフラ層の年代を,それぞれ10.2-10.3Ma,9.4-9.5Ma,8.7Maおよび8.0-8.1Maと推定した.さらに,内須川層と野村層(新潟県東部津川地域)に挟在する4層の指標テフラ層の対比が,グラフ対比法を用いた珪藻化石層序による対比とよく一致することを示した.
description.en: Diatom biostratigraphy and tephrostratigraphy are studied for the middle to upper Miocene Uchisugawa Formation in the northeastern Shibata area, Niigata Prefecture, central Japan. The formation is composed of massive diatomaceous mudstone intercalating numerous tephra beds, four of which are widely distributed and useful for long-distance correlation. Diatom analysis was conducted for five stratigraphic sections, and diatom zones from NPD 5B through NPD 6B with nine useful diatom biohorizons are recognized in the Uchisugawa Formation. As a result, a high-resolution integrated diatom biostratigraphic and tephrostratigraphic framework is established. On the basis of sedimentation rate curves constructed for the five stratigraphic sections using the ages of the diatom biohorizons, the ages of the four widespread tephra beds, Kdg, Gtm, Skhq and Jng tephra beds, are estimated to be at 10.2-10.3Ma, 9.4-9.5Ma, 8.7Ma and 8.0-8.1Ma, respectively. Graphic correlation between the Uchisugawa Formation and the Nomura Formation in the Tsugawa area (Yanagisawa et al. 2003) confirms the correlation of tephra beds between the two areas.

publisher.en: The Association for the Geological Collaboration in Japan

paper_title.ja: 群馬県太田地域，金山丘陵に分布する海成中新統の層序と年代
paper_title.en: Stratigraphy and geochronology of the Miocene marine sequence in the Ota area, Gunma Prefecture, central Japan

description.ja: 群馬県太田市強戸町中強戸付近の丘陵地開発工事に伴って露出した海成中新統について詳細なルートマップおよび地質柱状図を作成し露頭写真等と併せて報告した.さらに,模式地における藪塚層との岩相ならびに堆積場の相違,さらに地質構造から推察される層位関係に基づいて,上記海成層を藪塚層に重なる緑町層として定義した.珪藻化石により,緑町層の年代はCrucidenticula kanayae帯(NPD 3A)上部の生層準D33(16.7Ma)とD35(D16.4Ma)の間に位置づけられることが判明した.これらの年代層序学的情報をもとに,足尾山地および八溝山地周辺に分布する中新世火山岩類との対比を行った結果,いわゆる大谷石で代表される中新世軽石流堆積物の噴出は,15.4〜I5.1Maの庭谷不整合を挟んで二分されることが示唆された.
description.en: Stratigraphy of the Miocene marine sequence in the Ota area, Gunma Prefecture, central Japan is established. Based on the lithological defference, as well as on the stratigraphic relationship, the volcano-sedimentary sequence in the Ota area is divided into lower non-marine volcaniclastics of the Yabuzuka Formation and overlying marine sediments of the Midorimachi Formation (newly defined). Pumice flow deposit unconformably covers the Midorimachi Formation is suggested to be correlated with the lowest Middle Miocene felsic products such as the Oya Formation, widely distributed along the eastern margin of the Ashio Mountains. Stratigraphic correlation of the volcano-sedimentary successions around the Ashio and Yamizo Mountains suggests that the Early to Middle Miocene felsic products are divided into two stages, that is before and after the Niwaya Unconformity at about 15 Ma. Twelve samples of the Midorimachi Formation yield age diagnostic diatom fossils, which indicate that the sequence falls between the diatom biohorizons of D33 (16.7 Ma) and D35 (16.4 Ma) of the upper Crucidenticula kanayae Zone (NPD 3A).

publication_name.en: Journal of the Geological Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: 新潟県北蒲原地域の胎内川における鮮新統鍬江層最上部の古地磁気層序
paper_title.en: Magnetostratigraphy of the uppermost part of the Pliocene Kuwae Formation (Natsui Section) along the Tainai River, Kitakanbara area, Niigata Prefecture, central Japan

publication_name.en: Journal of the Japanese Association for Petroleum Technology

paper_title.ja: 千葉県銚子地域に分布する中新統の年代層序
paper_title.en: Chronostratigraphy of the Miocene Series in the Choshi area, Chiba Prefecture, central Japan

description.ja: 関東平野東端の銚子地域に分布する中新統について,既報の資料および新たに得られた珪藻化石・K-Ar年代および古地磁気極性をもとに年代層序を総括し,従来の夫婦ヶ鼻層を夫婦ヶ鼻層(再定義)および千人塚層(新称)として二分した.夫婦ヶ鼻層の海成シルト岩は,産出した珪藻化石により,Crucidenticula kanayae帯(NPD3A)下部の,珪藻生層準D30(16.9Ma)とD33(16.5Ma)の間に位置づけられる.一方,千人塚層の凝灰質砂岩に挟在する古銅輝石安山岩溶岩について20.3±0.5MaのK-Ar年代を得た.また,同安山岩溶岩の古地磁気極性は正帯磁であることから,千人塚層の安山岩溶岩はChron C6A付近の正磁極節に対比される.両層には400万年程度の年代差が存在することから,両者の関係は不整合と考えられる.
description.en: Chronostratigraphy of the Miocene Series in the Choshi area, central Japan, is established on the basis of diatom biostratigraphy, K-Ar dating and paleomagnetic polarity. The previously described volcano-sedimentary succession of the Metogahana Formation is divided into two units, i.e. the lower andesite lava flows and the tuffaceous sandstone of the Senninzuka Formation (newly proposed), and the overlying marine siltstone of the Metogahana Formation (re-defined). The Senninzuka Formation can be correlated to the normal polarity interval around the Chron C6A (ca.21-20 Ma), whereas the diatom fossils from the Metogahana Formation indicate a latest early Miocene age (ca.17-16 Ma). The time gap of about 4 m.y. suggests the presence of an unconformity between these two units.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Geological Society of Japan
